page.title: 07DUFTON YOUTH CLUB
page.content: We meet once a week,ages range from 5-18.Winter meetings are in the Village Hall.We play games for everybody to join in,like British Bulldogs,relay races & tiggy.In summer we play rounders or cricket on the village green.Once a month we hire an inflatable which costs 10p extra per child.In May we have our annual camp, usually in the Lake District.October sees 3 or 4 months' work all put together for the night of our play. The children are the actors & help both backstage & in the house.It is a very popular event. Over the last 2 years,& with the help of village people,we have saved a sum of Â£400.If we can keep up as success- fully,we hope to buy a pool table & a disco unit.The Youth Club is well attended & the children enjoy their regular meeting.
